business.headline: Sensex tanks over 500 points: Why is the stock market down today?The Sensex and Nifty fell sharply after rising in early trade. Here are three things you need to know about today's stock market weakness.

Explained: Why Senco Gold shares crashed 20% after Q3 results Senco Gold share price: In the third quarter, Senco Gold reported a nearly 70% drop in consolidated net profit to Rs 33 crore, compared to Rs 109 crore in the same period last year.

JioCinema, Disney+ Hotstar merge to launch JioHotstar: What it means for youReliance Industries and Walt Disney's India business finalised their merger in November 2024, creating a joint venture with Viacom18 Media.
Sensex, Nifty gain as US-India trade talks show positive signsThe S&P BSE Sensex was up 86.75 points to 76,225.72, while the NSE Nifty50 added 12.50 points to 23,043.90 as of 9:46 AM.
Nasdaq rises over 1% on inflation relief; Tesla soars 6%, Nvidia up 4%The Nasdaq Composite jumped 1.5%, the S&P 500 gained 1.04%, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.77%

New Income Tax bill explained: What's changing and what's notNew Income Tax bill: It aims to simplify the existing Income Tax Act, 1961, by making it more structured and easier to understand. If passed, the new law will come into effect from April 1, 2026.

EPFO likely to maintain 8.25% interest rate on PF deposits EPFO interest rate: In 2024-25, EPFO processed over 50.8 million claims worth Rs 2.05 lakh crore when compared to 44.5 million claims amounting to Rs 1.82 lakh crore settled in the previous year, as per the official data.

Adani Green Energy exits Sri Lanka wind power deal; stock down 1%Adani Green Energy shares: As per the agreement with Sri Lanka, Adani Green was to construct two wind power projects in Mannar town and Pooneryn village, both located in the northern province of the country.

Sensex, Nifty erase gains to end lower as IT stocks weigh in on stock marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 32.11 points to close at 76,138.97, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 13.85 points to end at 23,031.40.

Finance Minister Nirmala SItharaman introduces new Income Tax Bill in Lok SabhaFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman tabled the new Income Tax bill in Lok Sabha amid the huge uproar by the opposition MPs. The bill will now be referred to the Select Committee of Lok Sabha for further review.
New Income Tax Bill tabled in Lok Sabha, faces select panel reviewThe government, in a bid to simplify the present Income Tax Act, 1961, has introduced a new income tax bill in Parliament today.

Explained: Why are large-cap mutual funds back in demandWith small-cap and mid-cap stocks experiencing corrections, investors are moving towards large-cap funds, which are considered safer and more stable in volatile times.

Quality Power IPO: 10 things investors must know before subscribing Quality Power Electrical Equipments Limited offers high-voltage electrical equipment and solutions for grid connectivity and energy transition.

New Income Tax Bill: How will it make taxpayers' lives simpler?The new income tax bill would be almost half of the current law, as the existing Income Tax Act,1961 contained 880 pages when it came into existence.
Sensex gains 500 points: 3 reasons why stock market is rising todayAs of 10:48 AM, the S&P BSE Sensex was up 47.85 points at 76,644.93, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 137.75 points to 23,183.00.

Sensex, Nifty open higher as cooling inflation boosts market sentimentShare Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 163.21 points to 76,334.39, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 46.25 points to 23,091.50 as of 9:30 AM.

Ajax Engineering IPO: Check allotment status, listing date and latest GMPAjax Engineering IPO allotment status: The IPO price band was set at Rs 599 to Rs 629 per share. The minimum lot size for the application was 23 shares. For retail investors, the minimum investment required was Rs 13,777.

New Income Tax Bill to be tabled today: Here's what you can expectNew Income Tax Bill is expected to come into effect on April 1, 2026. The bill aims to simplify tax laws, remove outdated provisions, and make compliance easier for taxpayers.

Can a married couple save more taxes using both old and new tax regime?Married couples need to determine which tax regime offers lower tax liability for each spouse considering their income structure and deductions.

India's retail inflation dips to 4.31% in January, hits a five-month lowThe country's retail inflation witnessed a drop in January majorly due to declining food prices, according to data released by the National Statistics Office on Wednesday.

Sensex, Nifty recover sharply but end in red; M&M falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex settled 122.52 points lower at 76,171.08. Earlier in the day, the 30-share index had plunged 850 points. Nifty, too, recovered strongly to end 26.55 points lower at 23,045.25.

Mutual fund inflows see slight dip in January. Here's whyThe flows declined 3.6% month-on-month to 396.88 billion rupees ($4.57 billion) from 411.56 billion rupees in December 2024, according to data by the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI).

New Income Tax Bill to introduce simpler 'tax year' concept: All you need to knowWhen the Income Tax Act of 1961 came into being it had 880 pages. Over the years, the act contained several amendments introduced in the various budgets.

Stock market bloodbath: Should buy the dip, exit or stay invested? The stock market correction has particularly hit retail investors, many of whom are contemplating selling their holdings at a loss. But is that the right move?

After 90-hour workweek remark, L&T chief stirs work-from-home debateThis is not the first time that the L&T Chairman's remarks have sparked a debate.  Earlier, he advocated a 90-hour workweek, which drew huge criticism.

Will retail inflation cool down further in January? Here's all you need to know The RBI mentioned continued reduction in rice prices and sharp corrections in the prices of vegetables, especially in the prices of onions, potatoes and tomatoes, in its January 2025 Bulletin.

L&T chief stirs fresh row with remark on labour crisis: Workers unwilling to moveSpeaking at CII's Mystic South Global Linkages Summit 2025 in Chennai, Subrahmanyan spoke about the difficulties faced by the construction industry in hiring and mobilising workers.

Sensex falls 700 points: 4 reasons why stock market is falling todayStock market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex plunged over 850 points before trimming some losses, trading 748.13 points lower at 75,545.47 by 10:23 am. The NSE Nifty50 also slipped nearly 1%, reflecting weakness across broader markets.
Sensex tumbles over 850 points as US tariff fears spook Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex nosedived 834.39 points to 75,459.21 at 10 am, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 251.95  points to trade at 22,819.85.

Madhya Pradesh: Rs 1,553 crore for Ladli Behna Yojana released. Check eligibilityLadli Behna Yojana aims to improve women's well-being, health, nutrition and economic independence. Presently, Rs 1,250 per month is given to all the eligible women under this scheme.

8th Pay Commission: Will its implementation face delays?Despite several measures announced for taxpayers in the Union Budget 2025, there was no mention of the financial impact of implementing the 8th Pay Commission.

Are you eligible for fixed medical allowance under NPS? Check details Retired central government civilian employees who are covered under the National Pension System will now be eligible for fixed medical allowance, announced the Department of Pension & Pensioners' Welfare.

Sensex ends 1,000 points lower: 5 factors behind today's stock market crashInvestors lost nearly Rs 10 lakh crore as selling pressure intensified across sectors due to various factors that dampened investor sentiment.

Sensex falls 1,000 points, investors lose Rs 10 lakh crore on Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex tanked by 1,1018.20 points to end at 76,293.60, while the NSE Nifty50 fell by 309.80 points to close at 23,071.80.

India's inflation likely to dip to a 5-month low of 4.60% in January: ReportThe country's consumer inflation is expected to fall to a five-month low of 4.60% in January 2025, as compared to 5.22% which was recorded in December last year, as per Reuters.

India to keep ban on Chinese investments for now, says Chief Economic AdviserSpeaking at an event in Mumbai on Tuesday, Chief Economic Adviser (CEA) V. Anantha Nageswaran said that any changes to the current restrictions would take time and require a deeper understanding between both countries.

Coimbatore company rewards employees with Rs 14.5 crore bonus. Here's whyA few days ago, the CEO, Saravana Kumar, formally announced the release of the bonus. He shared that he deliberately did not choose to offer employee stock options (ESOPS) or performance-based incentives.

Hotmail co-founder Sabeer Bhatia critisises Aadhaar and UPI in a podcast Sabeer Bhatia mentioned that the use of video and voiceprint technology for the Aadhaar project, which is already embedded in smartphones, could have been a better approach which could have achieved the same results at much lower costs.

Not Mumbai or Bengaluru, this Indian city leads in luxury home price surgeMumbai, traditionally known for its expensive real estate, was placed seventh in the global rankings for luxury home price surge.

Sensex crashes over 1,000 points: What's behind today's stock market bloodbath?Stock market crash: At 1:12 pm, the Sensex was down 1051.88 points to 76,261.90, and the Nifty fell 321.15 points to 23,060.45. Most broader market indices were also in the red as volatility spiked sharply.

entertainment.headline: Mrs director Arati Kadav on backlash over missing credits: Glad it was called outDirector Arati Kadav addresses the backlash over Mrs not crediting The Great Indian Kitchen in the trailer, stressing the need for proper recognition. Mrs, starring Sanya Malhotra, is streaming on Zee5.

Viral video: Kanan Gill made same remark as Ranveer Allahbadia years agoAs Ranveer Allahbadia faces backlash for his India's Got Latent remark, an old video of Kanan Gill asking the same question resurfaces on the internet.

Kanye West, Bianca Censori heading for divorce? Team clarifiesIt was previously reported that singer-rapper Kanye West and his wife, Bianca Censori, had split and were headed for divorce. However, a recent development has refuted these claims, labelling them as "tabloid rumours."

Sanya Malhotra's Mrs. makes questions on marital rape, mechanical sex personalImagine a woman bleeding for five days in a month, and those five days being the most peaceful in her life because she can finally refuse sex to her husband. He can't assert his power over her. That's how Sanya Malhotra's 'Mrs.' unsettles you and makes you think.

Singer-composer Vishal Dadlani meets with an accident, undergoes treatmentVishal Dadlani of the Vishal-Sheykhar duo is undergoing treatment after an accident, leading to the postponement of their upcoming concert scheduled for March 2.

Not just Gujarat, all Samay Raina shows cancelled amid India's Got Latent rowSamay Raina's shows in India have been cancelled following controversy around India's Got Latent, with Gujarat shows being the first to be affected.

Singer Jonita Gandhi to perform at Lollapalooza India, will open for Shawn MendesJonita Gandhi will perform at Lollapalooza India on March 8, opening for Shawn Mendes. Her latest single Channa has also been nominated for a Juno Award.

Twilight star Taylor Lautner to return as werewolf in self-aware werewolf seriesTwilight star Taylor Lautner is returning to portray a werewolf in the self-aware Amazon series. Details of the show are yet to be revealed.

Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly seeks blessings at Maha KumbhActor Rupali Ganguly visited Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj with her family. She shared moments from her spiritual visit, including performing aarti, attending a hawan, and meeting a saint.

Nawazuddin Siddiqui begins Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in LucknowActor Nawazuddin Siddiqui has begun Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in Lucknow. The actor will be seen sharing screen space with Chitragandha Singh.

Olivia Swann on NCIS: Sydney, her character's growth & challenges In this exclusive interview with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, Olivia Swann dives deep into her role in NCIS: Sydney, sharing insights into her character's journey, development, and challenges throughout the series.

Rozlyn Khan sues Ankita Lokhande for defamation over 'cheap' remark TV actor Rozlyn Khan took legal action against Ankita Lokhande's recent comments. Ankita had called her 'cheap', for her claims about Hina Khan's cancer battle.

Jackson Wang makes a powerful comeback with High Alone from Magic Man 2Jackson Wang drops a new single, High Alone, that marks the beginning of his new album, MAGIC MAN 2. Actor John Lithgow approached to play Albus Dumbledore in Harry Potter seriesAward-winning American actor John Lithgow has reportedly been approached to play the iconic character of Hogwarts principal Albus Dumbledore in HBO's Harry Potter series.

Jonas Brothers hint at big change for 2025, shocked fans ask, 'another breakup?'The Jonas Brothers shared a letter on social media that briefly sent fans into a panic. In it, they hinted at their 2025 lineup and expressed gratitude to their fans for supporting them throughout their musical journey.

Kapil Sharma's 'Maa Baap ki Kabaddi' joke goes viral amid Ranveer Allahbadia rowAmid the controversy over Ranveer Allahbadia's comment on Samay Raina's show India's Got Latent, an old clip of Kapil Sharma joking about kids watching "maa baap ki kabaddi" is going viral.

Ed Sheeran's India dump features photo from football match with John AbrahamSinger Ed Sheeran shared his India dump, which also featured a glimpse of his football match with Bollywood actor John Abraham. Sheeran is in India for his Mathematics Tour.

Aly Goni feels Samay Raina was 'forced' to delete India's Got Latent episodesActor Aly Goni has commented on YouTuber-comedian Samay Raina's decision to remove episodes of India's Got Latent. Fans have also reacted to Samay's decision on social media.
Odia rapper Abhinav Singh, 32, dies by suicide in BengaluruA rapper from Odisha, Abhinav Singh, died in Bengaluru where he was working for a private company. He was 32.

Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl Halftime show is the most-watchedRapper Kendrick Lamar's Super Bowl Halftime show has become the most-watched Super Bowl show of all time, garnering an impressive 133.5 million views.

Too much to handle: Samay Raina deletes all videos from his show amid jokes rowComedian Samay Raina finally broke his silence on the controversy over Ranveer Allahbadia's remark on his show, India's Got Latent. He has confirmed deleting all the videos of the show, and also added that whatever is happening right now is too much for him to handle.

Amy Adams joins Javier Bardem in Cape Fear TV adaptationAfter Javier Bardem, actor Amy Adams is on board for the much-awaited Cape Fear TV adaptation. The release date for the show has not been announced yet.

Kanye West dropped by talent agency amid antisemitic, controversial actionsKanye West's controversial actions have led to his talent agency, 33&West, dropping him. The decision follows a series of antisemitic remarks and troubling social media posts by the rapper that have sparked widespread condemnation.

Samay Raina's show in Gujarat cancelled amid India's Got Latent controversyComedian Samay Raina's Gujarat shows have been cancelled following a controversy sparked by the latest episode of his show, India's Got Latent. The decision comes amid backlash after a distasteful comment by YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia on the show.

Sakamoto Days: With ex-assassin's potential match, the anime is raising stakesSakamoto Days follows the story of a legendary assassin who transforms into a family man. Now, with the introduction of an equally formidable enemy, the anime might finally pick up pace and raise the stake.
Aashram 3 Part 2 teaser: Bobby Deol's comeback as Baba Nirala promises more twistsAashram 3 Part 2 teaser is out. The upcoming riveting crime drama marks the return of Bobby Deol as Bala Nirala.

Anupamaa actor Gaurav Khanna opens up on being colour-blind on Celebrity MasterchefTV actor Gaurav Khanna appeared on Celebrity MasterChef where he opened up about being colour-blind. He participated on the show along with Ayesha Jhulka.

BTS' V named world's most handsome man. Hrithik Roshan, Brad Pitt also on listBTS singer V aka Kim Taehyung has been named as the world's most handsome man. The list also features Indian actor Hrithik Roshan, Hollywood stars Brad Pitt, Tom Cruise, Bradley Cooper, among others.

Picture This trailer: Simone Ashley, Hero Fiennes to headline new romantic comedyThe trailer for Simone Ashley and Hero Fiennes Tiffin's film, Picture This, has been unveiled. It will release on Prime Video on March 6.

Jackson Wang announces MAGIC MAN 2 – A raw and vulnerable chapterJackson Wang is set to release MAGIC MAN 2, an album that delves into the stages of grief and personal growth. After a year of introspection, he presents a raw and authentic portrayal of his journey.

Pop girl group XG take their 'The first HOWL' World Tour to Latin-America  XG, a dynamic hip-hop/R&B-inspired girl group, is set to captivate audiences in Latin America with their inaugural concerts in Brazil and Mexico. As they continue their world tour, XG unveils a groundbreaking project, 'XDM Unidentified Waves,' that redefines their music and solidifies their global appeal.

Munawar Faruqui to Vir Das, comedians who landed in trouble for inappropriate jokesAs podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia faces backlash for his obscene jokes on an episode of India's Got Latent, here's a look at other stand-up comedians who have found themselves in trouble.

Diddy allegedly 'drugged and raped' a man, claims new lawsuitMusic mogul Sean Combs is embroiled in fresh legal trouble as an anonymous plaintiff files a sexual assault lawsuit against him in New York.

The phone dropped...: Story of Jitendra Kumar's humility and unassuming successActor Jitendra Kumar, popularly known as Jeetu Bhaiya, says the bigger thing is not to decide whether to take a risk in life or not, but to know what is at stake.

Arunachal women panel condemns Elvish Yadav's 'racist' remarks against Chum DarangThe Arunachal Pradesh State Commission for Women has condemned Elvish Yadav's derogatory remarks against Chum Darang and has demanded strict action. The comments have sparked backlash.

general news.headline: Modi gets lot of tareef, India gets loads of tariffs from Trump on key US visitModi-Trump meet: A warm hug was followed by a firm handshake as PM Modi entered the White House, but the chill was palpable following the US President's announcement of sweeping reciprocal tariffs.

26/11 plotter extradition, F-35 jets, trade deal: Takeaways from Modi-Trump meetModi-Trump meet: The key takeaways from the Modi-Trump meeting were the extradition of 26/11 Mumbai terror attack accused Tahawwur Rana to India and the F-35 jet deal.

Trump's offer of F-35 to India: A game-changer for air superiority?The Donald Trump administration has offered to supply India with the F-35 Lightning II fighter jet, a fifth-generation stealth fighter renowned for its ability to operate undetected at supersonic speeds.

Flattery and friction: How foreign media reported PM Modi's meeting with TrumpPrime Minister Narendra Modi's meeting with US President Donald Trump garnered significant attention from global media, with many outlets making note of the friction between the two sides over trade and tariffs.

Chhaava review: Vicky Kaushal's film growls, but doesn't roarReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Chhaava movie review: Director Laxman Utekar's Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, is based on the life of Maratha King Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj. Brilliant Vicky Kaushal uplifts this strenuous film, says our review.

PM steers clear of Adani question, Rahul Gandhi takes 'personal matter' jabModi-Trump meet: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, when asked about the US indictment of Gautam Adani, said such 'personal matters' were not discussed during his meeting with Trump.

Supreme Court declines urgent hearing to Ranveer Allahbadia over FIRs in joke rowYouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia approached the Supreme Court against multiple FIRs filed against him over an obscene joke on the reality show 'India's Got Latent.'

Trump's special gift for 'friend' Modi, signs it 'Mr Prime Minister, you are great'Trump gifted PM Modi a signed copy of 'Our Journey Together', a photobook chronicling his first term in the White House. He personally signed the book, inscribing: "Mr Prime Minister, you are great."

Lost in space: The asteroid landing that was never meant to happenTwenty-four years ago, a spacecraft with no landing mechanism touched down on a chunk of rock in space. Defying all odds, the Nasa spacecraft became the first in history to not just orbit a minor planet, but touch it. It miraculously survived for two weeks and transmitted crucial data back to the Earth.

JioHotstar is now live in India, merges content from Jiocinema and Disney HotstarJioHotstar has recently launched in India. Users can now watch content from both Jiocinema and Disney+ Hotstar in one app.

Clean Yamuna, landfills: BJP's 10 major challenges in Delhi after historic winAfter a historic win in Delhi, BJP faces the challenge of fulfilling promises like cleaning the Yamuna, offering freebies, and improving infrastructure while balancing a tight budget.

Trump praises PM Modi: Not a contest, he's a tougher, better negotiator than mePrime Minister Narendra Modi and Trump engaged in bilateral talks, focusing on key issues such as trade, defence, and immigration. During the joint press briefing, the US President praised PM Modi's negotiating skills.

The Diplomat trailer: John Abraham on a deadly mission to save 'Daughter of India'The Diplomat trailer starring John Abraham in the lead was released on February 14. The trailer highlights the efforts of Indian diplomat JP Singh in bringing India's daughter back home.

Captain America Brave New World review: Roger that, Sam's Caps never fully soarReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Captain America Brave New World movie review: Director Julius Onah's film starring Anthony Mackie and Danny Ramirez, is an uneven addition to the Marvel Cinematic Universe. The performances are good, but the film lacks identity.

India's Got Latent row impact: Samay Raina's stocks grow, Ranveer Allahbadia hitA controversy erupted after Ranveer Allahbadia, during an episode of 'India's Got Latent', asked a question to a participant that included "parents" and "sex" among other obscene references.

Trump says US to make wonderful deals for India, PM talks of $500 billion targetUS President Donald Trump welcomed Prime Minister Modi to the White House hours after he announced reciprocal tariffs that levies tariffs on US imports.

MAGA + MIGA = MEGA partnership, says PM Modi as India, US vow to boost tradePrime Minister Narendra Modi, during his official two-day visit to the US, said that India is moving towards MIGA (Make India Great Again), which is his version of MAGA (Make America Great Again).

Kerala's Rs 1,000-crore half-price scam: Victims explain how they got dupedIn one of the biggest scams in Kerala, a 26-year-old graduate duped 40,000 people across the state with a Ponzi-style network, offering scooters, mobiles, laptops and other household items at half their price. This is how Ananthu Krishnan pulled off the state-wide Rs 1,000-crore scam.

$1,000 fine for men ejaculating without intent to conceive under new Ohio billThe two lawmakers who proposed the bill "The Conception Begins at Erection Act" said the aim is to "call out the hypocrisy" of "bills that regulate women's bodies."

Orry claims Ananya Panday was 'insecure, jealous' of his presence in Call Me BaeOrry revealed he had a fallout with Ananya Panday during Call Me Bae as she was 'insecure and jealous' of his presence. He believes her reaction proved he is on the 'right path' in his career.

Deewaniyat: Harshvardhan Rane announces his next romantic film After the phenomenal success of Sanam Teri Kasam, Harshvardhan Rane has announced his next film. Titled Deewaniyat, this 'unforgettable romance' is set to hit theatres later this year.

sports.headline: Champions Trophy winners to get USD 2.2 million as ICC increases prize poolThe ICC has increased the prize pool for the Champions Trophy which returns after a hiatus of nearly 8 years. The tournament is set to start from February 19 and has guaranteed a participation fee of $125,000.

Mbappe returns to France squad for Nations League quarter-final: DeschampsDidier Deschamps confirmed Kylian Mbappe's return to the France squad for the Nations League quarterfinal against Croatia after the Real Madrid star rediscovered his form following a slow start to life in Spain.

Maxwell, Head return as Australia makes major changes in final ODI vs Sri LankaSL vs AUS: Australia made a total of 5 changes for the final ODI match vs Sri Lanka. Australia brought in the heavy hitters before the Champions Trophy.

IPL teams' involvement will not affect Pakistan players in Hundred: GouldIndian Premier League's involvement in the Hundred would not affect the participation of Pakistani players in the tournament, said ECB chief executive Richard Gould. 4 IPL teams recently bought stakes in the competition.

Pakistan captain backs star batter with interesting takeODI tri-series final: Speaking on the eve of the final, Pakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan defended Babar Azam, saying the star batter is facing additional pressure because of 'extreme expectations'. McCullum hits back at 'factually incorrect' criticism over England's practiceEngland head coach Brendon McCullum has hit back at the criticism over England holding fewer practice sessions during their recent white-ball series against India.

Champions Trophy: Shreyas Iyer's admission reveals India's think-tank problemWhy fix something that isn't broken? India seem to be overcomplicating their combination in the ODI series against England, which is a worrying sign ahead of the Champions Trophy. There appears to be a real problem of plenty for coach Gautam Gambhir and captain Rohit Sharma. Why on earth did they leave out Shreyas Iyer for the series opener in Nagpur? An injury to Virat Kohli meant Shreyas got an opportunity after a late phone call from the skipper. The star batter revealed he was not in the XI as late as the eve of the match.

After Champions Trophy snub, Yashasvi Jaiswal to play Ranji Trophy semifinalAfter missing out on a place in India's final 15-man squad for the Champions Trophy, Yashasvi Jaiswal was drafted into Mumbai's Ranji Trophy squad for their semi-final against Vidarbha in Nagpur.

Babar Azam not in form? Pakistan captain backs star batter with interesting takeODI tri-series final: Speaking on the eve of the final, Pakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan defended Babar Azam, saying the star batter is facing additional pressure because of 'extreme expectations'. Babar failed in the first two matches of the series.

PAK vs NZ, tri-series final Live Streaming: When and where to watch?Tri-Series in Pakistan 2025: Pakistan and New Zealand are all set to clash in the final of the tri-series on February 14 in Karachi. Here are the complete details of where to watch the match live on TV and on the internet.

IPL: Did Virat Kohli say no to returning as RCB captain for 2025 season?IPL 2025: After retiring from T20Is last year, Virat Kohli was widely expected to return as RCB captain. However, on February 13, the franchise appointed Rajat Patidar as their skipper for the upcoming season.

Unsold in auction, teenager gets Mumbai Indians call-up after World Cup heroicsWomen's Premier League 2025: Mumbai Indians roped in U19 World Cup star Parunika Sisodia as a replacement for injured Pooja Vastrakar. Defending champions RCB will miss the services of Asha Sobhana as the leg-spinner has been ruled out due to injury.

Bangladesh appoint Mehidy Hasan Miraz as vice captain for Champions TrophyBangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) announced Mehidy Hasan Miraz as their vice-captain for the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025. Bangladesh will start their campaign against India on February 20.

Families not to travel with Indian players for Champions Trophy to Dubai: Report Champions Trophy 2025: The Indian team is set to leave for Dubai on February 15. However, families won't accompany the players for the three-week-long tournament.

Stop calling me king, I am not there yet, Babar Azam tells fans and mediaStar Pakistan batter Babar Azam has urged his fans and the media to stop calling him king. Babar hasn't had a memorable run in the first two matches of the tri series.

UP Warriorz focused on playing positive brand of cricket: Deepti Sharma WPL 2025: In the Star Sports Press Room - WPL Captain's Huddle, newly-appointed skipper Deepti Sharma said that the UP Warriorz will be looking to play a positive brand of cricket and turn their fortunes around after failing last season when they couldn't go beyond the league stage.
Rawalpindi Cricket StadiumThe Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium is one of the three venues in Pakistan hosting the Champions Trophy 2025. Established in 1992, the stadium has a seating capacity of 15,000.

Gadaffi Stadium, LahoreWith a seating capacity of 34,000-plus, the Gadaffi stadium in Lahore is the biggest stadium in Lahore. The stadium will be hosting 4 matches during the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025, including the semi-final 2.

Can South Africa overcome poor ODI form to strike gold in Champions Trophy?South Africa eye redemption in the Champions Trophy, aiming to shake off their "chokers" tag. With a strong batting lineup, spin concerns, and injury woes, Bavuma's men must step up to reclaim past ICC glory.

IPL 2025: Rajasthan Royals appoint Sairaj Bahutule as spin bowling coachRajasthan Royals appointed former India wrist spinner Sairaj Bahutule as their spin-bowling coach for the upcoming season of the IPL.

Rohit forgets T20 World Cup win? Kohli hilariously explains in new adRohit Sharma hilariously forgets India's T20 World Cup triumph in a new Dream11 ad, featuring Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant, and KL Rahul, as the team sets its sights on Champions Trophy glory.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
